title: Can fingering the anus stretch it out permanently? - Quora

Much more commonly seen is that the fear inhibits the person achieving their goal and enjoying the result.

Not very likely. The anus has an extremely strong set of external muscles that go back to their original tight seal within time after any amount of stretching.
